# Appcat Docs

## Azure Migrate application and code assessment

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/app-code-assessment-toolkit.md): Learn how to assess .NET applications to evaluate their readiness to migrate to Azure.
- [Install](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/install.md): Learn how to install Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET
- [Visual Studio walkthrough](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/visual-studio.md): Learn how to assess .NET applications to evaluate their readiness to migrate to Azure with Visual Studio.
- [Visual Studio Copilot assessment](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/visual-studio-copilot.md): Learn how to use GitHub Copilot with the Azure Migrate application and code assessment tool for .NET when evaluating apps for Azure migrations.
- [.NET CLI walkthrough](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/dotnet-cli.md): Learn how to assess .NET applications to evaluate their readiness to migrate to Azure with the .NET CLI.
- [Interpret the results](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/interpret-results.md): Learn how to interpret the results the analysis of .NET applications with the Azure Migrate application and code assessment tool.
- [Custom configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/custom-configuration.md): Learn how to include a JSON file to configure your code assessment
- [FAQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/faq.md): Frequently asked questions for the Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET
